title: Announcement, After Ten Years: Detroit Focus, 1989
signed: Signature imprinted in maroon ink, recto, upper left quadrant: Design: Edward Fella
inscribed:
Recto: Imprinted in maroon from upper edge, center to center, right: Eileen Aboulafia/ Pi Benio/... [lists participating artists]... Gary Zych; across lower left edge, running upward, sideways: CURATORS: DETROIT FOCUS EXHIBITION COMMITTEE; across lower left edge: Joe Zajac/ Joseph Wesner/... [lists names of curators]... Richard Axsom; across lower half of sheet: MARCH170APRIL14, 198 9/ OPENING RECEPTION:MARCH 17, 5- 8:30PM/ ALSO/ ALSO IN/ IN THE/ THE AREA:/ AREA:/ Robert Caskey, Wendy Macgraw, Nelson Smith. Rod Strickland/ Detroit Artists Market Opening/ 5-7:30 P.M./ MARK YOUR CALANDARS: Wednesday, April 5, 7:00- 9:00 P.M. DETROIT PUBLIC LIBRARY Main Library/ Friends/ Friends Auditorium/ 5201 Woodward Avenue/ PANEL DISCUSSION:/ ALTERNATIVE SPACE-- WHAT IS IT?/ Moderator:/ Gere Baskin, Board Member and Midwest Regional Representatve to/ National Association of/ Artists Organization/ PANELISTS:/ Samuel Sachs II, Director, Detroit Institute of Arts/... [lists panelists, biographic information]... Detroit/ Focus./ DETRIT FOCUS GALLERY/ 743 BEAUBIEN 3RDFLOOR DETROIT MICHIGAN48226/ AFTER TEN YEARS: DET-/ R OIT FOCUS
Verso: Across lower left quadrant: Detroit Focus Gallery/ 743 Beaubien, 3rd Floor/ Detroit, Michigan 48226/ Across from the Bricktown People Mover Station People Mover Station/ Detroit focus is a member of the National Association of Artists Organizations (NAAO)/ with the support of: The National Endowment for the Arts/ The Michigan Council for the Arts/ The Detroit/ Council for the Arts/ Community Foundation for Southeastern Michigan/ Ford Motor Company Fund; across lower right quadrant: Nonprofit Org./ Bulk Rate/ U.S. Postage/ Paid/ Detroit, Michigan/ Permit No. 2960
description:
Poster/ announcement printed in maroon for Detroit Focus Gallery exhibition, designed to be mailed.  Text in various sizes, styles throughout.   
Recto: From upper edge, center to center, right, text giving participating artists, including Edward Fella.  Left edge, on line with Edward Fella's name, "Design:" is imprinted.  Across lower left edge, text giving curators.  Across lower half of sheet, dates, times, reception, location, contact, and additional information. 
Verso: From upper right corner to lower right quadrant, line of serrated circles (like seal stickers) and other cut-out shapes with spikes.  Across lower third of sheet, text giving sponsors and mailing information.

tombstone.epitaph:
Announcement, After Ten Years: Detroit Focus, 1989. Offset lithograph on off-white paper. 
Gift of Edward Fella. 1995-42-54
